summary: Web application project requiring design improvements including layout, colors, and icons based on reference site

existing_features.title: Update the color scheme to match the reference site at https://magical-sofa-cleaning-d8q.caffeine.xyz, replacing the current teal/cyan/blue water jet theme with the new color palette
Replace all Font Awesome icons throughout the application with new icons that match the design style of the reference site
Update the overall layout and design structure to match the reference site's visual hierarchy and component arrangement
Update gradient backgrounds, glassmorphism effects, and visual decorations to align with the reference site aesthetic

new_feature_requests.summary: Update design, colors, and icons to match reference site style
